sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"含义，意义，意思"之意。
means: meaning ： 普通用词，使用广泛。既可指语言表达的意思，又可指手势、符号、表情或艺术品或抽象概念所含的意义。
sense ： 特指词、短语或句子的某种特定意思。也常指多种解释的一种。

sentence.Network_en: Politicians have debased the meaning of the word "freedom"
sentence.Network_cn: 政客们贬低了“自由”一词的意义。

sentence.Network_en: Art has real meaning when it helps people to understand themselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 当艺术有助于人们了解自身的时候才有真正的意义。

sentence.Network_en: People use scientific terms with no clear idea of their meaning.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们使用科学术语，但并非很清楚其含义。

phrase.cizu_name: not know the meaning of the word

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)behave as if unaware of the concept referred to or implied

lj.lj_ly: Humanity? You don't know the meaning of the word!.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: verbal noun from mean

entry.def: The meaning of a word, expression, or gesture is the thing or idea that it refers to or represents and which can be explained using other words.

example.ex: I hadn't a clue to the meaning of 'activism'...
example.tran: 我根本不明白 activism 的意思。

example.ex: I became more aware of the symbols and their meanings.
example.tran: 我进一步理解了这些符号及其意义。

entry.tran: (言语、书、电影等的)含义，主旨，意图
entry.def: The meaning of what someone says or of something such as a book or film is the thoughts or ideas that are intended to be expressed by it.

example.ex: Unsure of the meaning of this remark, Ryle chose to remain silent...
example.tran: 由于不确定这句话究竟是什么意思，赖尔选择了保持沉默。

example.ex: Her book is not without autobiographical meaning.
example.tran: 她的书不无为自己作传的意图。

entry.def: If an activity or action has meaning, it has a purpose and is worthwhile.

example.ex: Art has real meaning when it helps people to understand themselves.
example.tran: 当艺术有助于人们了解自身的时候才有真正的意义。

example.ex: ...a challenge that gives meaning to life.
example.tran: 使生活变得有意义的挑战

entry.tran: (由于缺乏经历、资质等)不理解这个词的含义，不知道什么叫…
entry.def: If you mention something and say that someone doesn't know the meaning of the word, you are emphasizing that they have never experienced the thing mentioned or do not have the quality mentioned.

example.ex: Don't mention failure when Kevin is around. He doesn't know the meaning of the word.
example.tran: 凯文在的时候不要提“失败”这个词。他不知道什么叫“失败”。

means.word_mean: 1. the message that is intended or expressed or signified;

sentences.sentence: "what is the meaning of this sentence"
"the significance of a red traffic light"
"the import of his announcement was ambigtuous"
"What is the meaning of this proverb?"

auth_sentence.content: They love to call him njamba - meaning hero.
auth_sentence.res_content: They love to call him njamba - meaning hero.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They love to call him njamba - meaning hero.

auth_sentence.content: Opposite meaning of what they're trying to say.
auth_sentence.res_content: Opposite meaning of what they're trying to say.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Opposite meaning of what they're trying to say.

auth_sentence.content: Life based on meaning and values does not exist.
auth_sentence.res_content: Life based on meaning and values does not exist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Life based on meaning and values does not exist.

Sentence.sentence: Among the kinds of social gestures most significant for second-language teachers are those which are identical in form but different in meaning in the two cultures.
In both of the examples above, speakers from two different cultures have the same gesture, physically, but its meaning differs sharply
The best comments are then sorted democratically by a voting system, meaning that your social learning experience is shared with the best and brightest thinkers.
Over time, the meaning of a word or an expression drifts meat used to mean any kind of food, silly used to mean, believe it or not,blessed.
the gradual change of word meaning
Personally I can't quite see the meaning in his modern works.

sentences.en: Duff explained his meaning shortly but clearly.
sentences.cn: 达夫简短但清楚地解释了他的意思。

sentences.en: There is some dark meaning in his words.
sentences.cn: 他的话里有某种隐晦的含义。

sentences.en: I can't quite grasp the meaning of these figures.
sentences.cn: 我不能很好地领会这些数字的重要性。

jushi.english: This is a word with six distinct meanings.
jushi.chinese: 这个词有六种不同的意思。

jushi.english: There is a negligible difference in meaning between these two words.
jushi.chinese: 这两个词之间在意思上差别是极小的。

jushi.english: The word “heart” has several discrete meanings.
jushi.chinese: “heart”这个词有好多不相关的词义。
